info.name: Dark Comfort for Google
info.additionalInfo:
Dark UI theme for Google.com
Author: R3gi, Czech Republic

Initially based on style by Nass O. Designed to be pleasing for eyes during the whole day!

Feel free to report issues and unthemed items.

If you find it useful, don't be afraid to leave a comment or you can buy me a beer ;-)

Enjoy!

style.css:
@-moz-document regexp("https?://www.google.(com|([a-z]{2}))(.[a-z]{2})?."), regexp("https?://www.google.(com|([a-z]{2}))(.[a-z]{2})?/((\\?|webhp|search|gfe_rd|auth|gws_rd|#q|imghp|#gfe_rd|#safe|#pws|#tbs|#gws|#tbm).*)"), regexp("https?://encrypted.google.(com|([a-z]{2}))(.[a-z]{2})?/((\\?|webhp|search|gfe_rd|auth|gws_rd|#q|imghp|#gfe_rd|#safe|#pws|#tbs|#gws|#tbm).*)"), regexp("https?://encrypted.google.(com|([a-z]{2}))(.[a-z]{2})?."), regexp("https?://www.google.(com|([a-z]{2}))(.[a-z]{2})?/_/chrome/newtab\\?.*") {
/*
 * Name:    Dark Comfort for Google
 * Author:  R3gi, based on style by Nass O
 * Version: 2019.07.17.12.05
 */

/* Background */
html,
body,
#cnt,
.rg_l,
#botabar,
.ZINbbc {
    background: #263238 !important;
    color: #c5c5c5;
}
.sfbgx {
    background-color: #455a64 !important;
    border-color: #455a64 !important;
}

/* Inverting colors */
.gb_Vb,
._kac,
#qbi,
.ab_icon,
.gsok_a,
._Fnc,
._Jxg,
.stt-uf,
._dVi,
.kcb.checked::after,
._gW,
.knowledge-finance-wholepage-chart__highlight-line {
    -webkit-filter: invert(1)grayscale(1) !important;
    -moz-filter: invert(1)grayscale(1) !important;
    filter: invert(1)grayscale(1) !important;
}
._Zgf {
    -webkit-filter: invert(.6)grayscale(1) !important;
    -moz-filter: invert(.6)grayscale(1) !important;
    filter: invert(.6)grayscale(1) !important;
}
._n0b {
    -webkit-filter: invert(0.3) !important;
    -moz-filter: invert(0.3) !important;
    filter: invert(0.3) !important;
}

/* ICONS INVERSION */
.gb_Zb:not(.gb_Ab),
.gb_Xb,
.vk-t-btn,
.vk-cap.vk-sf-b,
._olf,
._cXm,
._xkk,
._FOl,

/*.gb_3b,*/
.gb_6b,
/*.gb_Ec:not(.gb_hb):not(.gb_Lg):not(.gb_Mg):not(#gbsfw),*/
._apj,
._Zoj,
._ae.rlf__ami:not(:hover),
._jug,
span.double-date-picker-cal,
*[class*="_dismiss-button"],
.i8Msie,
.XCKyNd,
.z1asCe svg,
.qa__svg-icon svg,
.FjdPod {
    filter: contrast(0) sepia(100%) brightness(0) invert(1) !important;
    opacity: 1 !important;
}
._pxg span :not(_Ixg) {
    filter: invert(1) grayscale(1) brightness(0.4) !important;
}

/* Images opacity */
#hplogo,
#logo img,
.gbii {
    opacity: 0.7;
    transition: opacity .2s;
}
#hplogo:hover,
#logo img:hover,
.gbii:hover {
    opacity: 1;
    transition: opacity .5s;
}

/* BOX SHADOW – WHITE */
.fw-ch-sel {
    box-shadow: 0px 18px 0px -16px #FFFFFF;
}

/* BOX SHADOW – DARK BORDER */
.u8H8Fd {
    box-shadow: 0 1px 0 #263238;
}

/* SCROLLBAR Chromium*/
*::-webkit-scrollbar {
    background: #1E272B !important;
}
*::-webkit-scrollbar-button {
    display: none !important;
}
*::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,
*::-webkit-scrollbar-track,
.gb_va {
    border: 0 !important;
    box-shadow: none !important;
}
*::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: #455A64 !important;
}
*::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: #607D8B !important;
}
*::-webkit-scrollbar-corner,
*::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: #1E272B !important;
}

/* Search bar */
#sb_ifc0,
.RNNXgb{
    background: #37474F;
}
.flt-around-date,
._Bj ._vOe {
    background-color: #37474F! important;
    border-color: #263238! important;
}
.flt-around-date:hover {
    border-color: #546E7A! important;
}
.sbibod {
    background-color: #37474F;
    border-color: #263238;
    border-radius: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
}
.sbib_a {
    background: #37474F;
}
.sbhcn,
.ktf:hover,
.xtSCL {
    border-color: #546E7A;
}

/* Text Input #C5C5C5 */
input,
#lst-ib,
select,
._-cQ,
.ktf::placeholder {
    color: #FAFAFA !important
}
input {
    background-color: #37474F;
}

/* Header */
.sfbgg,
.minidiv .sfbg {
    background-color: #455A64 !important;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #455a64 !important;
    border-color: #455A64;
}
.mw,
._PJ,
._e1q,
._uFh,

/* Footer */

    border-color: #455A64 !important;
}

/* RED text color */

/* Strong Blue links */

}

td._xh.vk_gy._Vi,

div._b5e .vk_bk,

}

/* Button Shadow Hover */

    background-image: linear-gradient(to top, #546E7A, #546E7A);

}

    /*margin: 0;*/
}

/* TRANSLATOR */
.tw-lang-selector-wrapper {
    border-color: transparent !important;
}
.tw-lang-selector {
    color: #BDBDBD !important;
}
.tw-lang-selector:hover {
    color: #FFFFFF !important;
}
.tw-lang-selector-wrapper:after {
    border-color: #8E8E8E transparent !important;
    color: #8E8E8E !important;
}
.tw-lang-selector-wrapper:hover:after {
    border-color: #B1B1B1 transparent !important;
}
.tw-menu-btn:hover .tw-menu-btn-image:first-child {
    background-color: #161616 !important;
    border-color: #161616 !important;
}
.tw-menu-btn {
    color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.54) !important;
}
.tw-menu-btn:hover {
    color: rgba(208, 208, 208, 0.87) !important;
}
.tw-data-text,

}

}
option {

}

}

}

    background-color: #37474F !important;

}

    background-color: #263238 !important;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to top, #263238, #263238) !important;

}

/* Special Events (euro, world cup, olympics) */

.oly-card-ttl,

}

}

}
.oly_mbt__hltd-medal-row td,
._Dji {

}
.oly_mbt__rank {

}

}

.sE6sWb {
    background-color: transparent;
}
/* FIX for SVG diagrams */
g rect {
    fill: transparent;
}
g text,
.fw-ch-svg,
.h7xSye {
    fill: #FAFAFA !important;
    color: #FAFAFA !important;
    stroke: none !important;
}
